name: Enosis Solutions
tagline: Offshore Provider of Software Engineering Services
description:
Enosis Solutions is an offshore Software Engineering Company located in Dhaka, Bangladesh and Development Partners to numerous technology companies in USA, Canada and Europe. With top-talent application development skills on board, Enosis crafts compelling Web, Desktop and Mobile apps for its clients. Our Clients come up with some revolutionary concepts and we put life in those concepts by delivering cutting-edge Web, Desktop and Mobile Applications. 

Our team is comprised of expert Mobile App Developers, Web App Developers and Software Quality Assurance & Testing Engineers. Apart from developing mobile and web applications, we also design and deliver contextualized software testing solutions that leverage deep industry-specific understanding with technology-specific competencies and unique testing-focused assets. 
Enosis has served companies from a wide array of industries with scalable software products to meet individual company demands. We have served companies in the Enterprise Computing Space by creating Custom Business Intelligence tool used by more than 10,000 professionals in Fortune 500 companies. We have developed cutting edge Medical Practice Management Software for the healthcare industry.
